greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence for sequences that are constant for all even terms >= 2.
comment: Restricted growth sequence transform of A141310.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..100000
formula: a(1) = 1, and for n > 1, if n is even, a(n) = 2, otherwise a(n) = (n+3)/2.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Oct 02 2018
